definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: lit. to want to get fat with only one mouthful (proverb)/fig. to try to achieve one's goal in the shortest time possible/to be impatient for success
pinyin: yi1 kou3 chi1 ge5 pang4 zi5

definition: lit. you cannot get fat with only one mouthful (proverb)/fig. learn to walk before you run
pinyin: yi1 kou3 chi1 bu4 cheng2 pang4 zi5

sentences.english: Why can you have fatso little brother?
Fatso took offense to this, spun around and bit the 36-year-old man on his right leg.
sentences.chinese: 胖子採取攻擊並且轉身咬了這位36歲男子的右腿。

sentences.english: But still, you can't called on all of female compatriots give priority on fatties.
sentences.chinese: 但不能號召全體女同胞把對象優先放在胖子身上。

sentences.english: “You can't get fat from eating a single mouthful” goes a saying in China.
sentences.chinese: “一口喫不成胖子”，中國的諺語說。

sentences.english: Is this not of more consequence than a fat red-faced gentleman's sums?
sentences.chinese: 這難道不比那個大胖子紅臉先生的帳目更重要？

sentences.english: They nicknamed him" Fats" because of his weight.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他胖，人們給他取個綽號叫“胖子”。

sentences.english: Russia's (Julia) Pakhalina and that fatty from Canada (referring to Blythe Hartley).
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯的帕卡琳娜和加拿大那個胖子。

sentences.english: The thin feels hurt once touched, whereas the fat is not of afraid of being poked because they have got thick skin.
sentences.chinese: 瘦子被打一下就疼，胖子被戳也不怕，因爲肉厚。

sentences.english: Gobinda Babu of our school was very dark, and short and fat.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校的戈文達先生是一位皮膚黝黑的矮胖子。

sentences.english: Most footballers have an amazing body, but there are some who are really chubby.
sentences.chinese: 足球運動員多數都身材不錯，但也不乏胖子。

sentences.english: Hazy darkness, Yu-ming, another fellow from "The Fat Man, " the phone.
sentences.chinese: 朦朧夜色中，於得明接到另一位老鄉“胖子”的電話。

sentences.english: He was a massive black giant and I was a pudgy little redhead.
sentences.chinese: 他是個大黑塊頭，而我是個紅頭髮的小矮胖子。

sentences.english: Because I work in the government organ, I hate fatties.
sentences.chinese: 由於本人在政府機關工作，很討厭胖子。

sentences.english: The fat man received him with his usual boisterous cordiality.
sentences.chinese: 那胖子以他一貫的興高采烈的熱誠接待了他。

sentences.english: Just in the evening fatty when suffering from diarrhea, he also quite not arrive where work to.
sentences.chinese: 只是晚上胖子在鬧肚子的時候，他也好不到哪裏去。

sentences.english: Among those arrested now is avantgarde artist Ai Weiwei.
sentences.chinese: 現在那些被抓的人士中有先鋒藝術家艾胖子。

definition: household dish, implement or furniture/domestic animal/(coll.) guy/chap/weapon
stupid great hulk of a man
eldest of father's younger brothers/uncle (term used to address a man about the age of one's father)
see 老頭子|老头子[lao3 tou2 zi5]
